response:
Always shave from both directions i.e., down and upward direction is the key for smooth shaving. Start with down stroke and then with upward stroke. After every stroke wash or dip the razor in cold water to remove the clogged hair in razor. Best time to shave is immediately after shower as hair will be weak and soft which gives a closer shave.
Which would you prefer to choose, random hacks, or continue hygiene tips?
